I remember as a kid on my final day of being at my old school we had like a party at the cafeteria, everyone dressed nice and they got a DJ.

And I decided to fucking DANCE LIKE A MAD MAN AND I MADE A FUCKING CROWD! That shit was probably the best confidence boost ever!
